meanings.definition: A South Asian condiment made from pickled fruits or vegetables
meanings.sent1: The spicy achar added a burst of flavor to the meal.
meanings.sent2: My mom makes delicious achar with mangoes and spices.
meanings.sent3: The achar on the table made my taste buds dance with joy.
meanings.sent4: The tangy achar was like a party in my mouth.
meanings.sent5: The traditional achar recipe has been passed down for generations.
